source.name: RAM
source.instructions: **Which of these statements is not true about RAM**

answers.answer: Allows fast access to instructions for the CPU
When the power is turned off the contents of RAM are emptied
The contents of RAM cannot be changed

source.name: ROM
source.instructions: **Which one of the following would not be contained in ROM**

source.name: RAMorROM
source.instructions: **Select whether these statements refer to either RAM or ROM:**
source.text:
Contains instructions to boot up the operating system: <<<ROM>>>
Contains currently running programs and data: <<<RAM>>>
Cannot be changed: <<<ROM>>>
Is a type of Volatile memory: <<<RAM>>>

text: Contains instructions to boot up the operating system:
Contains currently running programs and data:
Is a type of Volatile memory:

source.name: Flash
source.instructions: **Which one of the following storage devices does not use flash memory**

source.name: VirtualMemory
source.instructions: **Which of the following is not true about virtual memory**

answers.answer: It is used when RAM is full
Hard drive is used to act as RAM
Accessing the hard drive for instructions is quicker than RAM
Prevents the computer from crashing when RAM is full
